page.title: 20Local News: June 1985
page.content:
Badger Team Set to Move Onto Carn Brea ______________________________________ {The owner of Carn Brea Castle,near {Redruth,has told the Ministry of {Agriculture that he does not want {their Badger-catching teams on his 6 {acres of hilltop land.
Vandals Smash-up School _______________________ {Vandals broke into Redruth school in {the early hours of Monday and caused {considerable damage in several {classrooms.
Higher Carnkie Methodist Chapel {_______________________________Higher {Carnkie Methodist Chapel was bursting {at the seams on Sunday evening and it {was all to do with Mr.D.Spogue of Carn {Brea.He welcomed back home his sister {who was born in Redruth.
